previewArticle.title: Montreal Impact vs. Toronto FC | Canadian Championship Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Montreal Impact 1, Toronto FC 0 | Canadian Championship Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Foul by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).
Álvaro Rey (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay in match Álvaro Rey (Toronto FC) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Giovanni Sardo
timelineItems.text: 30 seconds in, TFC defender pulls a Rivas and goes down.... #IMFC #JustJokes #WeLoveYouNelson

timelineItems.name: Restoration Pro
timelineItems.text: Sad showing! RT "@TFCLeafnation: Disappointed with the crowd tonight. Come on Montreal get out and support your team. #TFCLive #vcup”

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: The good news is it already looks like this one won't end 6-0. #TFC #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact).
Justin Morrow (Toronto FC) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Love Caldwell telling Di Vaio to get up there. #TFC #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by Hassoun Camara.
Attempt blocked. Álvaro Rey (Toronto FC) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jermain Defoe.

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Bernardello going down in his own penalty area tells you a lot about the player. Claiming Defoe elbowed him. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Sean Coleman
timelineItems.text: That's the 3rd straight corner that's given the #IMFC trouble. Defending set pieces a weakness of this team. #tsn690

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Après 15' #IMFC toujours très nerveux. Hésitant derrière, précipité en attaque. Besoin de calme

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Patrice Bernier.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Another one for Not So Instant Replay there as the referee scythes down Alvaro Rey.

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: Y'a quelqu'un en jaune qui aime pas le bleu... #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Dan Riccio
timelineItems.text: Great tackle by Henry. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Charles Brunet
timelineItems.text: #ImpactTVASports la chimie entre jacmac et mapp va être très importante ce soir ... il n'y a pas grand chose jusqu'à maintenant ! #imfc

timelineItems.name: Alexander Bruce
timelineItems.text: After yesterdays long journey for #TFC gotta figure they'll run out of steam pretty quickly considering the high pace of this game #TFClive

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Montreal tifo says "1 match to save the season" and they aren't wrong. #canChamp

timelineItems.name: MarkEightThree
timelineItems.text: 2 Cups 1 Week. #TFClive

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Montreal Impact 1, Toronto FC 0.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Felipe's late strike secures #canChamp repeat for @impactmontreal: http://t.co/C8rcb2pGx6 http://t.co/YQUEHaqr2e

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Felipe's late strike secures #canChamp repeat for @impactmontreal: http://t.co/C8rcb2pGx6 http://t.co/YQUEHaqr2e

timelineItems.name: Nancy Cholette
timelineItems.text: Cup game. Final. #imfc

timelineItems.name: David (P) Leonard
timelineItems.text: Patient play by @torontofc through the first 20 in Montreal. Building well. #tfclive #tictac #Vcup

timelineItems.name: DiD
timelineItems.text: Quel tacle d'Hassoun sur Defoe WoW!! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: J'aime le rythme du match. De gros tacles de chaque côté sur les attaquants star de l'équipe #imfc #tfc

timelineItems.name: IMFC Fans
timelineItems.text: #IMFC are piling unnecessary pressure on themselves here with some sloppy passing. Sharpen it up guys. #ACCFInal

timelineItems.name: Jeff Salisbury
timelineItems.text: Bernardello is having a howler out there so far. #VCup #CanChamp

timelineItems.comment: Luke Moore (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Superbe "c'est qui l'patron" d'Hassoun Camara sur Jermain Defoe. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kyle Bekker (Toronto FC) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Mark Bloom.
Jeremy Hall (Toronto FC) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Karl Ouimette (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Micoo
timelineItems.text: Sorry Bekker, but nice attempt at trying to pull a Defoe. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Hésitation... Les 2 centraux suivent Defoe, Moore souvent seul. Précipitation... Combien de passes forcées par Bernardello #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Shaun Cunningham
timelineItems.text: This match looking like a staring contest at the moment... #TFClive #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: so far Jeremy Hall doesn't look too sharp - tripping on ref earlier somewhat symptomatic - #IMFC #TFC #ACC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Jack McInerney.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Steven Caldwell.
Attempt missed. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) header from very close range is just a bit too high. Assisted by Hernán Bernardello with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: biag
timelineItems.text: Fortunate that Jack Mac didn't score there. #TFCLive #CCL #vcup #allforone

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Jermain Defoe (Toronto FC) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by Heath Pearce.

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Brutal marking there from TFC to allow McInerney to get a head on that corner. No way he should be allowed to win a ball in the air.

timelineItems.name: Rob Donia
timelineItems.text: Those really are a lot of empty blue seats. #Vcup #TicTac #DriveForFive #TFClive

timelineItems.name: IMFC Fans
timelineItems.text: So far both sides have lacked a whole lot of consistency. Many moments of class followed up by silly mistakes. #IMFC #TFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Steven Caldwell.

timelineItems.name: dave hodgkiss
timelineItems.text: Would like to see DeRo for Rey, Morgan for Lovitz and Gilberto for Hall in the second half #TFClive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Heath Pearce following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: #IMFC a résisté à la pression et commence à s'organiser. Bonne surveillance sur Defoe jusqu'à maintenant.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jermain Defoe (Toronto FC) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top right corner.

timelineItems.name: TweetTFC
timelineItems.text: Defoe is going to pounce on a Montreal mistake #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Di Vaio. Arrêt de Bendik. #IMFC Progrès...

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Really don't want to see #IMFC in the CCL again. Honestly, think Vancouver offered best chance for MLS in group stage.

timelineItems.comment: Karl Ouimette (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Álvaro Rey (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Mitchell Tierney
timelineItems.text: Impact looking good.They have looked the more dangerous of the two. If TFC didn't have Defoe they would have no offence at all. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Après avoir longtemps attendu son adversaire #IMFC s'installe de plus en plus dans le camp torontois #MTLvTOR

timelineItems.name: Tim Drodge
timelineItems.text: Stats on ref David Gantar. #TFC are 4-1-2 when he officiates. He's handed out 10 yellows & 3 reds to TFC - 13 yellows & no reds to opponents

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Justin Mapp.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Justin Morrow.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Mapp doit cesser d'être aussi généreux et de penser passe tout le temps. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Encore raté pour Di Vaio. La petite veine de son front gonfle, gonfle... #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: First win of the night. MT @JohnMolinaro: Saputo press box food beats BMO by a mile. #IMFC #TFC

timelineItems.name: Dominic Vidaroun Thanvilay
timelineItems.text: À la maison. À qui la coupe ? À nous la Coupe !! @stadesaputo @impactmontreal #imfc #imfclive #canadachampionship #torontofc #montreal #toronto

timelineItems.name: John Molinaro
timelineItems.text: #TFC fans in corner of East Stand at Stade Saputo. http://t.co/pmMchn8JiQ

timelineItems.name: John Molinaro
timelineItems.text: #TFC fans in corner of East Stand at Stade Saputo. http://t.co/pmMchn8JiQ

timelineItems.name: Rob Ditta
timelineItems.text: Not sure how I feel about that midfield though. Seems kind of weak if you ask me. Specifically in the centre. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Neil Crawford
timelineItems.text: Predicting extra time. maybe pens. #TFClive I'll appreciate the RT's when I'm right :)

timelineItems.name: chris fizik
timelineItems.text: Kinda anxious about the match. Let's go TFC. Shouts out to our traveling supporters! With you in spirit at Joes and across the city #tfclive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Steven Caldwell (Toronto FC) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jeremy Hall with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Dan Riccio
timelineItems.text: Even if both MLS and CCL may be a struggle for TFC, I think it is essential for the development of young players. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Mitchell Tierney
timelineItems.text: Already a call for a handball in this match. Is becoming a theme in this tournament. #TFCLive #VCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact).
Luke Moore (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Luke Moore (Toronto FC) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Steven Caldwell following a corner.
Offside, Montreal Impact. Wandrille Lefevre tries a through ball, but Patrice Bernier is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Bluecollardan
timelineItems.text: Another hand ball geeeez #imfc #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: La défense reste la même pour le match le plus important à date cette saison. #IMFC #IfItAinTBroke ;)

timelineItems.name: Toronto FC
timelineItems.text: Home is wherever I'm with you! #TFClive #DriveFor5 http://t.co/0lGIuIWkHP

timelineItems.name: Toronto FC
timelineItems.text: Home is wherever I'm with you! #TFClive #DriveFor5 http://t.co/0lGIuIWkHP

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Trois changements par rapport à samedi à Montréal : Perkins, Felipe et Nakajima-Farran remplacés par Bush, Berniier et Mapp #MTLvTOR

timelineItems.name: Elias Assoul
timelineItems.text: Selfie time au stade Saputo! Gotta love your job! #selfie #mtl #group #fun #IMFC #viptour

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: The ball-to-hand rule is so vague. Should be more black and white, IMO. Every hand ball becomes controversial at this moment in time.

timelineItems.name: Roogsy
timelineItems.text: So what happens if Montreal scores first? Does Nelsen throw away the (stupid) game plan (again!)? Can't keep going to the well. #tfclive

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: Allez les gars! #imfclive #imfc

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: With a brace on Sunday, can Defoe lead #TFC to a #CCL berth? WATCH live now: http://t.co/u8rhXUIp3J #canChamp http://t.co/E3avWZSXQR

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: With a brace on Sunday, can Defoe lead #TFC to a #CCL berth? WATCH live now: http://t.co/u8rhXUIp3J #canChamp http://t.co/E3avWZSXQR

timelineItems.name: DrRetro
timelineItems.text: Nous chantons les Rouge allez! #TFClive #allforone

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Cinq changements à Toronto par rapport à l'aller : les deux arrières latéraux, Bekker et les deux attaquants (Defoe, Moor) #MTLvTOR

timelineItems.name: Michael Przybyłowski
timelineItems.text: Packed Stadium for a cup final #TFCLive http://t.co/Azyt19RRUd

timelineItems.name: Michael Przybyłowski
timelineItems.text: Packed Stadium for a cup final #TFCLive http://t.co/Azyt19RRUd

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Music drowning crowd chants. Of course.

timelineItems.name: Marco D'Onofrio
timelineItems.text: Says a lot about Lovitz's performances thus far this season that hes starting in tonight's game.. the rookie has been impressive. #TFC #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Comienza el partido de vuelta de la Final del Campeonato Canadiense. Global: 1-1 #MTLvTOR http://t.co/nrvBnFwRwv

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Comienza el partido de vuelta de la Final del Campeonato Canadiense. Global: 1-1 #MTLvTOR http://t.co/nrvBnFwRwv

timelineItems.name: The Yorkies
timelineItems.text: All we know for certain is that one of these teams is about to score six goals. Fact. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Kelsey Patterson
timelineItems.text: #TFC players got to Montreal five hours late yesterday due to the storm. Flew over #YUL, weren't clear to land, and were sent back to TO.

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: Fistbumps pour tout le monde. #IMFClive https://t.co/9jBKI6TpmL

timelineItems.name: Mitchell Tierney
timelineItems.text: For anyone suggesting #TorontoFC don't really want the voyageurs cup.... I would say this lineup states otherwise. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Les deux équipes montent sur la pelouse pour un match où reconversions rapides, jeu au sol et dans l'axe devraient être à l'honneur #MTLvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Daniel Lovitz (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Iain
timelineItems.text: Not a lot of composure being shown on the ball from TFC tonight #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: "One match to save the season" #IMFC #MLS http://t.co/2SCsnlJRc6

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: "One match to save the season" #IMFC #MLS http://t.co/2SCsnlJRc6

timelineItems.name: Mitchell Tierney
timelineItems.text: Really surprised to see De Rosario on the bench tonight. Would have thought he was ideal to start in this match. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: alizabeth
timelineItems.text: Win or lose Joey is running onto the pitch after the match, isn't he? #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Bon #IMFC c. #TFC #BecauseItsTheCup

timelineItems.name: Armen Bedakian
timelineItems.text: Here we go. Amway Canadian Championship final. 1-1 the score from the first leg. Can Toronto FC get its fifth? #TFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Dan Riccio
timelineItems.text: Much like Saturday, Gilberto and De Rosario can be game changers from the bench. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Dominic Thanvilay
timelineItems.text: Bon match. #imfc #imfclive http://t.co/KEyJ2I33Wp

timelineItems.name: Dominic Thanvilay
timelineItems.text: Bon match. #imfc #imfclive http://t.co/KEyJ2I33Wp

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Joe Bendik.

timelineItems.name: Giovanni Sardo
timelineItems.text: Communication & body language don't seem very positive. #IMFC need to regroup at HT & come out stronger in the 2nd half.

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Attempt blocked. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: 44’ MANO?

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: If IMFC find a way to lose this match, Klopas is going to lose it. Oh... And what was I saying about handballs?

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Attempt blocked. Karl Ouimette (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Hand ball by Jeremy Hall (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Andrew Martelli
timelineItems.text: I don't care if he score last week but Doniel Henry is a huge liability at the back. #tfc #imcf

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Sarcasme dans les tribunes... Le public est bien dans le match. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Brad Taylor
timelineItems.text: That was a definite hand ball. #TFC Lucky.

timelineItems.name: Stéphane Demers
timelineItems.text: Il y a 50 min je disais: Les mains dans la surface seront-elles appelées ce soir ? #IMFC #TFC #AmwayCC

timelineItems.name: Ryan
timelineItems.text: Ya Montreal you don't get the easy handball calls. Should be Edmonton playing in this game. #jemesouviens #VCup

timelineItems.name: Cristina Carreiro
timelineItems.text: That was a boring half.. #justsaying #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Brad Taylor
timelineItems.text: Bekker is not an MLS player, let alone a starter, Nelsen needs to see this. Just awful. #TFCLive

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Montreal Impact 0, Toronto FC 0.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Après un mauvais départ, #IMFC a monté le niveau d'un cran dans les 15' dernières. Espoirs déçus de but et de penalty...

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Fin de la 1ra. mitad de la Gran Final del Campeonato Canadiense. Tú también eres parte de la conversación: http://t.co/QXrflq0AOr #MTLvTOR

timelineItems.name: John Molinaro
timelineItems.text: Klopas giving ref an earful as they walk off the field into the locker room. #IMFC #TFC

timelineItems.name: Effie
timelineItems.text: lots of chirping going on there...... #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Rob Donia
timelineItems.text: Caldwell still giving DiVaio TFClive #Vcup #DriveForFive #TicTac

timelineItems.name: Cynthia C.
timelineItems.text: Don't really know when this friendship started.. But I know it ain't gonna end anytime soon... �� #sisters #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Montreal Impact 0, Toronto FC 0.

timelineItems.name: Rob Ditta
timelineItems.text: This needs to be a massive second half for #TFC. No sleeping. This is Nelsen's opportunity to show he can coach a team onto victory #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Bon, Doneil Henry attaque les partisanes enceinte, maintenant. #IMFC #NotReally #ShouldHaveSeenHerLook

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Se decide un cupo a la Champions de CONCACAF y si estás en EE.UU. o México, tú lo puedes ver EN VIVO: http://t.co/tr3jk2zYsw #MTLvTOR

timelineItems.name: Rob Ditta
timelineItems.text: No urgency from #TFC. None. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: George
timelineItems.text: Defoe needs to pass the ball #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: #TFC fans are panicking, but Reds are in a good spot. Goal wins the tie. IMFC will drop off here shortly.

timelineItems.name: Tim Drodge

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Pas aussi en contrôle qu'on le souhaiterait chez #IMFC. Trop de contres du #TFC

timelineItems.name: Neil Crawford
timelineItems.text: Another amazing tackle in the box from Henry. Hes not shy despite all the pks given up. #TFClive

timelineItems.text: THAT IS WHAT DONEIL HENRY CAN DO!!!!! excellent challenge #TFC #TFCLive

timelineItems.text: I can't see either of these teams winning anything in the CL. This is just horrible. #VCup

timelineItems.text: TFC need to score. That's all, that's all the analysis I have. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: John Molinaro
timelineItems.text: Ultras now holding up six banners. Each banner with Impact player's name and minute he scored in the 6-0 win over #TFC.

timelineItems.name: Brad Taylor
timelineItems.text: Is Henry the only player who looks like he cares about this game?!? #TFC

timelineItems.name: Antoine Deshaies
timelineItems.text: Les #ultras rappellent le 6-0 de l'an passé au #tfc. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Wendy
timelineItems.text: Toronto FC cannot thread passes between players, OK. Please stop wasting time in attempting this in important games. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Rob Ditta
timelineItems.text: Oh Defoe. Please bury one. Please. #TFCLive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jermain Defoe (Toronto FC) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Kyle Bekker.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Doneil Henry.

timelineItems.name: Matteo Prandelli
timelineItems.text: Wow Romero putlling a... dare we say... Romerinho ? #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Patrice Bernier.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Moi au resto, je prends la même chose que Romero. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by Jack McInerney.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Mallace IN McInerney OUT. On parke l'autobus du côté #IMFC.

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Mallace remplace McInerney : le message de Klopas est clair “Allez Toronto, viens on t'attend“ #MTLvTOR

timelineItems.name: Stephanie Reinhart
timelineItems.text: Okay DeRo subbed on! Miracle in Montreal on its way!! #TFClive

timelineItems.name: IMFC Fans
timelineItems.text: Mallace on for McInerney, Klopas has shut up shop. #IMFC #DefendDefendDefend

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Steve T
timelineItems.text: Is anyone going to teach Doneil Henry how to pass a ball? #TFCLIVE

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Bruce Harding
timelineItems.text: Think Moore was a great pick up, especially as we only gave away our 5th choice CB #TFCLive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Hernán Bernardello following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Roz
timelineItems.text: Yeah, this isn't going to happen is it? #tfclive

timelineItems.name: Roogsy
timelineItems.text: I would have kept Rey over Bekker. #tfclive

timelineItems.name: Francis D. Casimiro
timelineItems.text: Bernardello, je l'adore #imfc

timelineItems.name: Roogsy
timelineItems.text: Nelsen's strategy of boring the other team to death & then throwing the kitchen sink at them for 20 minutes is in full effect. #tfclive

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Luke Moore (Toronto FC).
Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Michael Norton
timelineItems.text: Hernan Bernardello is being a tool. Bunch of dives, shoves, attitude towards the officials. The stuff nobody wants to see #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Cristina Carreiro
timelineItems.text: OH MY GOD OSORIO #TFClive

timelineItems.comment: Jonathan Osorio (Toronto FC) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Gilberto.

timelineItems.name: Darren Matte
timelineItems.text: Thought that was in for sure #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Pablo A. Ortiz
timelineItems.text: Stade Saputo went silent for a whole second. Wow. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Felipe Martins.

timelineItems.name: Tim Drodge
timelineItems.text: just cursed so loud on the Osorio goal post the better half made me close the living room window. #TFC #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Melisa
timelineItems.text: Quel match!!! @impactmontreal #Imfc http://t.co/0vQtRSg3zN

timelineItems.name: Melisa
timelineItems.text: Quel match!!! @impactmontreal #Imfc http://t.co/0vQtRSg3zN

timelineItems.name: Paul S-H
timelineItems.text: Looks like every player on the pitch is afraid to score. #VCup

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Less than 10 minutes to play in the #canChamp final + #TFC are pushing for a late goal. WATCH live here: http://t.co/ux8plRaYrB

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Jermain Defoe (Toronto FC) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Gilberto.

timelineItems.name: Kristin Knowles
timelineItems.text: I'm not sure that my nerves can take this. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: michael schillaci
timelineItems.text: pas bon pour le cœur #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Calum Mallace.

timelineItems.name: Rob Donia
timelineItems.text: When's the last time you've seen open play like this?! Both teams going for it. #TFClive #Vcup #TicTac #DriveForFive

timelineItems.name: GSharp
timelineItems.text: Maxime Tissot,.. time to get nervous! #IMFC #IMFClive #tsn690

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact).
Jonathan Osorio (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: IMFC Fans
timelineItems.text: For the love of god bring Nesta on! #IMFC #ACCFinal

timelineItems.comment: Luke Moore (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact).
Offside, Toronto FC. Kyle Bekker tries a through ball, but Steven Caldwell is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Kristin Knowles
timelineItems.text: Another foul, another free kick. Please let them do this. Oh please. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Stéphane Demers
timelineItems.text: Je me meurt ! #iMFC

timelineItems.name: Mitchell Tierney
timelineItems.text: What a finish after an incredibly boring match. #TorontoFC now looking desperate to get that goal. #TFCLive

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by Karl Ouimette.
Attempt blocked. Kyle Bekker (Toronto FC) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Pearce très solide ce soir. Il reprend du poil de la bête #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by Hassoun Camara.

timelineItems.name: Roz
timelineItems.text: I didn't want the stupid cup anyways #tfclive

timelineItems.name: Mark C
timelineItems.text: zero purpose. Why did we play so defensive? we had a goal to give..... #TFClive #TFClive

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: AAAAAAAAAAAHHHAAAAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA !!!!!! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Windy City Soccer
timelineItems.text: Meanwhile, Frank Klopas is about to win a trophy with #IMFC. MTL lead 1-0 (2-1 on agg.) over TFC in the #ACCFinal

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Toronto FC. Steven Caldwell tries a through ball, but Dwayne De Rosario is caught offside.
Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Felipe Martins.

timelineItems.name: Harshdeep Parmar
timelineItems.text: This is depressing. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Attention. Un but du #TFC amènerait les équipes en prolongation... Encore 3-4' d'ajouts

timelineItems.name: Chris Lazaris
timelineItems.text: It must be said, what a game by @HeathGPearce!!! Your finest yet, well done sir! #imfc

timelineItems.name: Alejandro Valdes
timelineItems.text: Game. Blouses. #TFClive #facepalm

timelineItems.name: Nico C.
timelineItems.text: Frank Klopas is about to win his first trophy as a #MLS coach. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Thomas C.
timelineItems.text: C'pas fini tant que c'pas fini guys! #IMFC #dontjinxit

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Felipe seals it late for #IMFC in #canChamp 2nd leg: http://t.co/X1ismsA9JW

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Du Vaio ne voulait tellement pas marquer ce soir qu'il préfère donner une passe décisive parfaite. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Antoine Deshaies
timelineItems.text: L'Impact de Montréal défend son titre de champion canadien avec une victoire de 1-0 vs Toronto (2-1 total). But de Felipe 90+2 #imfc #tfc

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Patrice Bernier tries a through ball, but Marco Di Vaio is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: DomSym
timelineItems.text: Victoire et toujours champion!!! @impactmontreal #IMFC #IMFClive Tous pour la coupe. Fier de mon équipe!!!

timelineItems.name: Alex Gold Apel
timelineItems.text: I would take Donail Henry on my team any day. Great Canadian kid. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Armen Bedakian
timelineItems.text: Now, MLS playoffs become vital. Absolutely vital for Toronto FC. #TFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Armada
timelineItems.text: Fulltime in #Montreal. #IMFC 2-1 #TFC on aggregate. Impact champions of Canada once again. #CanChamp #CCL

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Such a boring first half. Such a thrilling second half.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Montreal Impact 1, Toronto FC 0.

timelineItems.name: Rudi Schuller
timelineItems.text: I don't get the vitriol for Ryan Nelsen tonight. #TFC should have won this with the lineup that was out there.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: #IMFC take the #canChamp 2-1 on aggregate, secure 2014-15 #CCL berth. http://t.co/phnX8AJ9MD http://t.co/O3DyOpNBxL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: #IMFC take the #canChamp 2-1 on aggregate, secure 2014-15 #CCL berth. http://t.co/phnX8AJ9MD http://t.co/O3DyOpNBxL
